page.title: 18St Andrews Junior School
page.content: One of the local places that I use is St.Andrews Junior School which is on Coleman Street. It is not just a Junior School,it also contains an Infant and Nursery School. In the Junior section there are about 250 pupils,one of whom is me. I'm a fourth year and my sister is in the first year. Pupils in our school come from many parts of the world and they boast an array of different languages and colour of skin; not to mention names,which range from Joanne to Aksin and Martin to Vinod. The school has an attractive garden with a large collection of flowers, trees and plants. All the fourth year children will leave and go to schools all over Wolverhampton at the end of July. I'm sorry that I have to leave as I think it is a pleasant and likable place.
